name: SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell
description: Like a bastard child of Quake 3 and Super Meat Boy, SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell is truly hardcore and focuses on speed and fast reaction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB, Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   Marty is an early-riser; he usually wake up at 11am. However, today it’s a late morning for Marty; after a struggle to find the edge of his bed and make his breakfast, it’s nearly midday! What a dreadful start to the day. It didn’t take long for our friend to rediscover his smile as soon as he sat down on his favourite sofa. Then a knock on the door . . . “Who the hell is knocking on my door so early this morning,” thought Marty? Before reaching the knob, the door violently pulverised itself, and a Demon appeared in front of him. The Demon is after Marty’s beer reserves and a mighty brawl ensues between them. Marty loses his right arm in the fight but manages to inflict a major blow to the Demon, who in turn loses an arm too! After stitching the demon’s arm to his own body, it is time to retrieve his beer reserves. . . Time to go to “HELL”  Seum: Speedrunners from Hell is a FPS/Platformer/Parkour where you play Marty, an easy-going person who has been robbed of his beer reserve by a demon from Hell!   After a cartoon-style introduction, you will arrive in Hell’s main menu. From here, you will be able to choose between 3 modes of play. The first one is single player; this mode consists of one hundred levels divided into nines floors. The main objective in each of the levels is to go as fast as you can to the round blue portal without dying, and to find the hidden beer can, too. When you reach the 10 levels in each floor, you will unlock the boss level and upon clearing this level, you will be able to jump on the elevator to go down deeper into hell!  The second mode is a speedrun parkour where you will need to clear all the levels from one floor as fast as you can, and the time will be added to the end of each level.  The last one is the endless level. In this mode, you will need to accumulate meters without dying - a Hell of a mode.  I really enjoy the gameplay; the levels are fast and short and they become ever more challenging as you travel down to hell. As I mentioned above, you have to go as fast as you can to the blue portal with a time limit. If you manage to do half way through the time limit you will score a “HELL YEAH” demon symbol on that level. Then you will need to restart the level to find the hidden beer can. You must have a specific number of beer cans and demon symbols on each floor to unlock the boss level and the elevator. Marty has the ability to shoot fireballs with his new arm (a Hell of an arm) but will also find on certain parkours a teleporting or a gravity ability to be able to reach the portal. And yes, you will have plenty of obstacles to avoid. You also have a leader board, so if you fancy seeing your name at the top, you will need to be superfast. This game is really fun!  Great graphics accompanied with a hard rock soundtrack. The controls are fine and responsive and the game is very addictive.   Positive: ~~~~~~   - Great graphics - Hell has 100 levels - 3 different modes of play - Well-designed levels - Achievements and trading cards  Negatives: ~~~~~~~~   - Frustrating at times - Some of the beer cans are really hard to spot  8.5/10  A little bit of Hell in your games library will not hurt!  Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!    EPIC “THE CPT FROGGY” REVIEWS UP NOW ON ZEEPOND, THE HOME OF THE ALMIGHTY FROG   [www.zeepond.com]     FOLLOW THE CPT FROGGY CURATOR PAGE HERE

First i played the demo of this game. I liked it a lot the atmosphere of this game was so perfect! Then I got contact with the developers and became a closed beta tester. I have to say this game is epic. You can have a lot of hour in this game by beating records and looking for hidden beers. The graphics are suit the game well. This is one of my favourites now and I think this game has a chance to become a future classic (At least for me). The music is so **** good. So actually the whole game in one is perfect in my opinion. I'm sure i'll have at least 100 hours in this game :)

Sorry, but we don't have Arabic reviews . I have to type it here :(  the game is amazing and challenging with well made progression system you get easy levels at the start to figure out the game and it will keep getting harder and harder  Recommended!  --  لعبة ممتعة جدا تنفع للي يحبون يتحدون الارقام اللعبه طبعا Speedrun  بحيث ان في عقبات تجي قدامك والغاز وتحاول تحلها بسرعه عشان تكسر الرقم وتوصل بسرعة   انصح فيها ممتازة على سعرها وفيها تحدي كبير وطريقة المراحل متدرجة بشكل حلو بحيث اننك تفهم اللعبه ماتنحط كذا فجأه بشي معقد
You play Marty, trailer trash extraordinaire, as you race through hell to retrieve your stolen beer from Satan himself. 6/66 would race again.
Originally posted by  Lucifer :

A story driven adventure following the journey of a red-neck american who must travel through the depths of hell to retrieve his stolen beer from satan.  If story driven games are for you, this is an absolute must have.
DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review like all my other reviews, if you want a better full review, then please read better reviews then mine

This game is awesome! Game mechanics are not bound to your fps, making up for a really fair leaderboard! (to a millisecond!!1) The whole aesthetic + atmosphere + music are just 10/10! Can't recommend enough!
Incredibly addictive. Story is hilarious, with clever dialogue and quips delivered throughout. Gameplay is tight and keeps you coming back for more. Frustratingly difficult, insanely fun.
OMG,this game is one of the best games i played this year
It's ok
Great game, Fast and good.

This game is fun, fast and addictive. Just try and leave your highscore as it is when your friend is just miliseconds better than you. I'd like to thank the developer team for giving me a free CD-key at Reboot InfoGamer in Zagreb. I had no idea just how amazing this game is.  Any fans of old school fast paced games like Doom and Quake will love this. I can't praise this game enough. You won't regret buying this.

If you like Hotline Miami, you will like this.  PROS: Redneck humor Rad setting Hell Reflex-centric gameplay Instant restarts Short, intense levels Cool powerups Community levels  CONS: Somewhat short More challenging levels locked behind collectables  SEUM follows a similar loop of short, brutal stages centered around reflex action and planning over multiple tries. Definitely a game for perfectionists, the scoring system is definite and very clear in what constitutes a 'perfect' run.   9/10
WOW!!! Great game, nice graphics!!! I recommend it to everyone!!!

Do you like platformers similar to Super Meat Boy? Do you like shooters with traps like Serious Sam?  Then this game is for you.  SEUM: Speedrunners from hell is a speedrun based game where you have to make your way through 100+ levels as fast as you can by using only your fireballs, jumps and a few powerups you can find in certain maps. I highly recommend this game

Awesome game to kill time with, not as annoying and frustrating like SMB and similar games. It has great metal ambient music, plus the whole doom like atmosphere and psyhsics definately makes this game very enjoyable.
This game is just AWSOME! I picked it up for 9 bucks, IT WAS TOTALY WORTH IT! there is just one thing. On my MB-P the level editor do not work. I can not select items.   I give it a 9/10
Good game, lots of content, very fluid gameplay.

Very fun and challenging time trial game. Tons of levels with very good leaderboards and collectibles / easter eggs to be found.    The power ups are pretty easy to use, while adding a nice variety to the levels.    The music definitely fits the theme, throwing pretty awesome metal riffs at you while you make your journey through hell, trying to get back your stolen beer.    Controls are tight and feel alot like an old school fps.   Pretty good amount of content for the price, and it all seems optimized and so far, bug free for me.
If you love secrets, this game is for you
Pretty good.

I love this game with every pixel it creates on the screen. i love such speed running games and the music is making it even better  if you want to watch my Lets Play here is the link         YouTube™ Video:  WELCOME BACK TO HELL | Seum #2

very good game! The gameplay is good and smooth but there is one thing that i dont like, the story is pretty short i have played 3hrs so far and i have nearly finished all the levels....i know one of the main aspects of the game is to speedrun the levels but, id like it if there where more of them. I would be soo happy if there was a user map pool, because we all know how creative a community can be with maps. But at the end it still i VERY good game

Pros   Awesome Speed System Epic Jump Lengths Cool powers Difficult Scenarios Cool different paths    Cons   Voices Very difficult Instant Death when you just tap a spike.    Improvements   Maybe add both hands with animations? Multiplayer Races  10/10 SS

DISCLAIMER: I personally know the makers of this game. Also, pay no attention to the 'played' amount, as hours of various betas, alphas, show demos, etc. don't count.  THIS GAME IS AN ABSOLUTE BLAST!  There, that's that done.
